mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_supermarket(f_name, f_city_id, f_center_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{cityId}, #{centerId});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_supermarket SET f_name=#{name}, f_city_id=#{cityId}, f_center_id=#{centerId} WHERE f_id=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.f_id as id, A.f_name as name, A.f_city_id as cityId, A.f_center_id as centerId, CONCAT_WS(':',D.f_name,C.f_name,B.f_name) as address from t_supermarket A, t_city B, t_state C, t_country D WHERE A.f_city_id=B.f_id and B.f_state_id=C.f_id and C.f_country_id=D.f_id
